metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value:
South Carolina

KNOW ALL MEN by there Presents,
That I, Mary Ann Clark Sanders of the Province
aforesaid Spinster

For and in Consideration of the Sum of Thirteen Hundred
Pounds
current Money of
this Province to me in Hand paid at and
before the Sealing and Delivery of these Presents by [Samuel?]
Elliott the Receipt whereof I do hereby
acknowledge, have bargained and fold, and by these
Presents do bargain, fell and deliver unto the said Samuel
Elliott Six NEgroes One Man [Quach?]; Two Women
Hannah; and Bess; and Three Small Children by the Name
of Rinah; Little Bess; and Ralph; they and their [illegible]
with all their future Issue

TO HAVE AND TO HOLD the said Negro Man Quach;
Hannah; Bess; Rinah; Little Bess; and Ralph, with
their Issue

unto the said Samuel Elliott his
Executors, Administrators and Assigns, to his and their
only proper Use and Behoof for ever. And I the said

Mary Ann Clark Sanders My Heirs, Executors and
Administrators, the said bargained Premises unto the said

Samuel Elliott- his Executors,
Administrators and Assigns, from and against all Persons
shall and will warrant and for ever defend, by these Presents.
IN WITNESS whereof I have hereunto let
my Hand and Seal. Dated at Charles Town
on the first Day of January in the Ninth
Year of His Majesty's Reign, and in the Year of our
Lord 1769

Sealed and Delivered
in the Presence of

Mary Anne Sanders

Barnard Elliott

The Subscriber do hereby Agree
to and confirm the above Sales;
May 2d: 1773.
Witness. Tho [Lambols?]
John Thomas
Thos Rose
